response.overview: After many years BG is very pleased to bring back to his many fans: Tom Katt. Not since Fantasy Fight #2 (vs. Scott Randsome) and Fantasy Fight #4 (vs. Steve Marks) has Tom Katt graced the BG wrestling mat. And this time - he showed up hairy! At 5'7", 200#, Tom is pretty much the same weight as when he last wrestled for BG. In Nov of 2000 he competed in a Mr. Universe Contest in Italy and came in 7th. Quite an accomplishment. In FF#2 Tom wrestled and lost. In FF#4 Tom wrestled and won. In this match he's up against a smaller guy, but this guy is no pussy wrestler. In fact, not only is Rocky a very aggressive guy, but he's positively gorgeous. Sexy is an under-statement. At 5'8", and 170#, Rocky will rock your world, big time! Tom finds out how much a handfull Rocky is. But in the long run, Rocky goes down to a series of submissions and humiliations including Tom's famous over the shoulder spanking as he marches the loser around the wrestling mat. And, of course, the loser gets fucked.
response.title: Fantasy Fight 21
